20101224180927.000|20101224180929.000|TR0|ELIZABETH COHEN, SENIOR MEDICAL 
20101224180929.000|20101224180931.000|TR0|CORRESPONDENT:  So, let's take a look at 
20101224180931.000|20101224180934.000|TR0|where people are sick and what's going on 
20101224180934.000|20101224180936.000|TR0|here.  There's a total of about 89 people 
20101224180936.000|20101224180938.000|TR0|sick.  Fifty of them are in Illinois, that 
20101224180938.000|20101224180940.000|TR0|seems to be the hardest hit state.  Also, 
20101224180940.000|20101224180943.000|TR0|people in Missouri, Indiana, Wisconsin, 
20101224180943.000|20101224180945.000|TR0|and Pennsylvania and, then, also, the 
20101224180945.000|20101224180947.000|TR0|other states that you see there in green.  
20101224180947.000|20101224180949.000|TR0|And what's interesting, here, is that this 
20101224180949.000|20101224180952.000|TR0|is a matching strain.  It's a single 
20101224180952.000|20101224180954.000|TR0|strain.  And what that tells you is that 
20101224180954.000|20101224180956.000|TR0|there likely say single source for this

20101224184934.000|20101224184937.000|TR0|these cars, like price and speed.  But you 
20101224184937.000|20101224184939.000|TR0|can just plug in and go.  Demand has 
20101224184939.000|20101224184941.000|TR0|pushed every major car maker to design at 
20101224184941.000|20101224184943.000|TR0|least one electric car.
20101224184943.000|20101224184946.000|TR0|
20101224184946.000|20101224184948.000|TR0|And that brings us to number one, the 
20101224184948.000|20101224184950.000|TR0|number one innovation of 2010.
